mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.ACT_ID_, b.NAME_, b.LONG_ FROM ACT_RU_VARIABLE b JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION a WHERE b.NAME_ = 'nrOfInstances' OR b.NAME_ = 'nrOfCompletedInstances'

SELECT ACT_ID_, COUNT(ACT_NAME_), AVG(DURATION_), MIN(DURATION_), MAX(DURATION_) FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST WHERE ACT_TYPE_ NOT LIKE '%Event%' AND ACT_TYPE_ NOT LIKE '%Gateway%' AND (#{parameter} IS NULL OR PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter}) GROUP BY ACT_NAME_

SELECT DISTINCT a.NAME_ FROM ACT_RU_VARIABLE a JOIN ACT_RU_EXECUTION b ON a.EXECUTION_ID_ = b.ID_ WHERE (#{parameter.procDefId} IS NULL OR b.PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter.procDefId}) AND (#{parameter.procInstId} IS NULL OR b.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{parameter.procInstId})

SELECT a.ID_, b.ACT_ID_, b.START_TIME_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION a JOIN ACT_HI_ACTINST b ON a.ID_ = b.EXECUTION_ID_ WHERE b.END_TIME_ IS NULL AND a.IS_ACTIVE_ = TRUE AND (#{parameter} IS NULL OR a.PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter})
SELECT MAX(DURATION_), AVG(DURATION_) FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST WHERE (#{parameter} IS NULL OR PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter})

SELECT ACT_INST_ID_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION WHERE IS_ACTIVE_ = TRUE AND (#{parameter.procDefId} IS NULL OR PROC_DEF_ID_ = #{parameter.procDefId}) AND (#{parameter.procInstId} IS NULL OR PROC_INST_ID_ = #{parameter.procInstId})
